En.PIKACHU_PA1_TEXT_1: Paralyzes (slow by 30% for 2.5s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 2s) all enemies nearby when receiving damage. This ability goes on a 30s cooldown after it's triggered.
En.PIKACHU_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes (slow by 30% for 1s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 1s) enemies when it hits.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDER_SHOCK_TEXT_1: Pikachu releases electricity to a designated area, damaging enemies in the radius. Also paralyzes (slow by 30% for 1s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 1s) enemies hit.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_ELECTRO_BALL_TEXT_1: Pikachu hurls an electric orb at the targeted enemy, damaging and paralyzing (slow by 50% for 1s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 1s) all enemies in a small radius around the target upon impact. Deals bonus damage based on the enemy's missing HP. Against Wild Pokémon: The total damage is capped at 1200.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDER_TEXT_1: Pikachu drops wicked thunderbolts at a designated area for 2.5s, damaging enemies in the radius every 0.5s.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDER_TEXT_2: Increases the number of times this move strikes to 7. Does not increase the duration of the area.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_ELECTROWEB_TEXT_1: Pikachu attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, rooting them for 1.5s.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_VOLT_TACKLE_TEXT_1: Pikachu charges the targeted enemy, becoming unstoppable, damaging and throwing the target in the air for 1.4s. Pikachu then leaps back a set distance from the target from the same direction it approached from.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDERBOLT_TEXT_1: Pikachu attacks with a strong electric blast at a designated area; damaging and stunning enemies in the area for 1.25s.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDERSTORM_TEXT_1: Briefly become unstoppable and summon bolts of lightning 4 times over 3s in a radius around Pikachu. The first strike targets all enemy players in the radius and the next 3 strikes target a single random enemy player within the radius. Targets that are struck by bolts deal damage to their allies in a small area around them. Enemies in the area of multiple bolts during the first strike are only damaged once. All moves can be used during this Thunderstorm.
En.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDERSTORM_TEXT_2: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 30% Max HP Shield

Cn.PIKACHU_PA1_TEXT_1: 受到伤害时麻痹附近所有敌人（减速 30% 持续 2.5 秒，攻击速度降低 10% 持续 2 秒）。此特性触发后有 30 秒的间隔时间。
Cn.PIKACHU_BA1_TEXT_1: 第三次普通攻击为强化普通攻击，命中时造成更高的伤害，并使敌人麻痹（减速 30% 持续 1 秒，攻击速度降低 10% 持续 1 秒）。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDER_SHOCK_TEXT_1: 向指定区域释放电流，对范围内的敌人造成伤害。同时麻痹被击中的敌人（减速 30% 持续 1 秒，攻击速度降低 10% 持续 1 秒）。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_ELECTRO_BALL_TEXT_1: 向目标敌人投掷一个电球，对目标周围小范围内的所有敌人造成伤害和麻痹（减速 50% 持续 1 秒，攻击速度降低 10% 持续 1 秒）。根据敌人已损失的体力造成附加伤害。对野生宝可梦：总伤害上限为1200。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDER_TEXT_1: 向指定区域劈下暴雷，持续 2.5 秒，每 0.5 秒对影响范围内的敌人造成伤害。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDER_TEXT_2: 将此招式的攻击次数增加到 7。不会增加该区域的持续时间。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_ELECTROWEB_TEXT_1: 使用电网攻击并捕获敌人，使其 1.5 秒内无法移动。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_VOLT_TACKLE_TEXT_1: 势不可挡地冲向目标敌人，造成伤害并将目标击飞，持续 1.4 秒。招式结束后从目标接近的同一方向向后跳出一定距离。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDERBOLT_TEXT_1: 在指定区域用强力电流攻击，对区域内的敌人造成伤害并使其无法动弹 1.25 秒。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDERSTORM_TEXT_1: 短暂地进入守住状态，并在 3 秒内在自身周围的攻击范围内召唤 4 次闪电。第一次打击以范围内的所有敌方玩家为目标，接下来的 3 次打击以范围内的单个随机敌方玩家为目标。被闪电击中的目标会对周围小范围内的敌人造成伤害。所有招式都可以在集结招式中使用。
Cn.PIKACHU_MOVE_THUNDERSTORM_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，30% 冷却缩减，30% 最大体力值护盾
